job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: Lead experimental design to test business use cases, analysis of experiment results and development & deployment of advanced data science models – propensity, uplift predictive. Resource expected to be able to successfully complete tasks independently.<br><br>Required Skills:<br><br>-	Experimental Design<br>-	Deep understanding of Data Science models<br>-	Experience deploying Propensity & Uplift Models<br>-	Advanced statistical knowledge (Bayesian methods, causal inference) <br>-	Python Development<br>-	PySpark<br>-	ML Framework is a plus<br>-	NLP experience is a plus
